title: r/Pettyrevenge How I Embarrassed a Psycho Karen in a Public Restroom
description:
r/Pettyrevenge While waiting in line to use a public restroom, OP has an utterly bizarre interaction with an entitled Karen. OP isn't having it, so she flips the conversation back around on Karen and publicly embarrasses her in front of all the women. It's a tiny justice, but justice nonetheless!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BCEEMw7GDvw
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
